Package org.jivesoftware.spark.ui.conferences

Contains Conference Room specific components, such as room browsers and helpful conference utilities.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
RoomInvitationListener Users of this interface may want to intercept MUC Invitations for their own uses.
 

Class Summary
BannedUsers Handles unbanning banned users in Chat Rooms.
Bookmark  
BookmarkedConferences BookmarkedConferences is used to display the UI for all bookmarked conference rooms.
ConferenceCreator  
ConferenceData  
ConferenceData.ConferencePrivateDataProvider  
ConferenceRoomInfo The RoomInfo class is used to display all room information, such as agents and room information.
ConferenceRooms A UI that handles all Group Rooms contained in an XMPP Messenger server.
Conferences Conference plugin is reponsible for the initial loading of MultiUser Chat support.

DataFormDialog  
InvitationUI

Package org.jivesoftware.spark.ui.conferences Description

Contains Conference Room specific components, such as room browsers and helpful conference utilities.
